content: Hi I'm writing my senior thesis on PTSD in soldiers returning from Iraq. My thesis is "The debilitating effects of PTSD on soldiers returning from Iraq and Afghanistan are not being adequately acknowledged by the US military, nor are soldiers receiving proper treatment or being fairly compensated for its devastating effects on their lives." I need some testimonies or stories about PTSD or any information you can provide if you know how many soldiers have it, how it effects them, what is being done for soldiers with PTSD or have any solutions. It would be greatly appreciated and very helpful. Thank you!
reply: Hi I'm writing my senior thesis on PTSD in soldiers returning from Iraq. My thesis is "The debilitating effects of PTSD on soldiers returning from Iraq and Afghanistan are not being adequately acknowledged by the US military, nor are soldiers receiving proper treatment or being fairly compensated for its devastating effects on their lives." I need some testimonies or stories about PTSD or any information you can provide if you know how many soldiers have it, how it effects them, what is being done for soldiers with PTSD or have any solutions. It would be greatly appreciated and very helpful. Thank you!
title: Post Traumatic Stress Disorder-Thesis

content: Never cared much for 'negative' thesis statements - especially in the title. I would recommend that you examine the disorder and look at the present care and rehabilitation offered and make 'statements' on improving.
reply: Never cared much for 'negative' thesis statements - especially in the title. I would recommend that you examine the disorder and look at the present care and rehabilitation offered and make 'statements' on improving.

Im a student in high school in hawaii and ive been looking into military issues more as my sister just married someone in the army. Im doing my senior project on that issue and just wanted some more personal info than i could get off google or bias websites. thanks Just click on your name and follow the link to "your profile" then edit it. What you put here is perfect. You also read should the TOS and the posting basics listed at the top of each forum. I'll also add, be careful and respectful. PTSD is a very painful subject for more than a few here. Just trying to help you out. OK. Any questions you can also email one of the Mods listed at the top of the forum as well. Again GOOD LUCK. One final note, there is a forum dedicated to PTSD it's moderated by Dave Barker, he's very knolegable. But I warn you take the time to READ all the additional info aout the forum and TREAD LIGHTLY.
